messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: It seems that you have some... how do we put this... "Guests?" aboard your station... please just... dont let them wreck the place.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Science.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We got a merchant from another station coming to space station 13. His shop is docked in arrivals.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

The station is passing through a debris cloud, expect minor damage to external fittings and fixtures.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have the Crab Ambassador on the phone, he is saying that none of the tourists he sent to have a look around your station have contacted him. What is going on?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: I am going to ask again, what has happened to the crabs? Do we need to send an inspector?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You have given us no words about the crabs, we are sending an inspector to survey the situation

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Crabbe Station, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Nanotrasen News
messages.body: Evil crabs? On my station? It's more common than you think, come on down to Nanotrasen's evil crab convention to find out more!
